title: Git
content:
#  多账号配置 #  mkdir -p ~/.ssh && cd ~/.ssh ssh-keygen -t rsa -C cmp@abc.com -f ~/.ssh/github_id_rsa ssh-keygen -t rsa -C me@abc.com -f ~/.ssh/github_id_rsa_me ssh-add -D ssh-add -l # 配置公钥 vi config
# cmp Host github.com HostName github.com PreferredAuthentications publickey IdentityFile ~/.ssh/github_id_rsa User ademain # me Host github.com-me HostName github.com PreferredAuthentications publickey IdentityFile ~/.ssh/github_id_rsa_me User ademain 测试
ssh -T git@github.com-me

title: Hugo
content:
#  搭建 #  brew install hugo && hugo new site bonvoyage cd bonvoyage && git init git submodule add https://github.com/alex-shpak/hugo-book themes/hugo-book echo theme = \'hugo-book\' >> config.toml hugo new docs/hugo.md hugo server -D 配置 #  vim config.toml
baseURL = "ademain252.github.io" languageCode = "zh-CN" title = "A demain" theme = "hugo-book" 配置Github #  # create a new repository with name `ademain252.github.io`, change config.toml baseURL to `ademain252.github.io` hugo -D cd public git init git config user.name "ademain" && git config user.email "ademain0612@gmail.com" git add . && git commit -a -m "first commit" git log --pretty="%H %an <%ae>" git remote add origin git@github.com-hugo:ademain252/ademain252.github.io.git cat .git/config git push -u origin master 配置Github Action #  ssh-keygen -t rsa -b 4096 -C "ademain0612@gmail.com" # 指定的文件, /Users/niconi/.ssh/id_rsa_hugo_deploy ademain252.github.io (public)
 配置public key到Deploy keys  ademain252.github.io.blog (private)
 配置private key到Secrets Actions, 设置 ACTION_DEPLOY_KEY 配置Actions脚本  参考 #   https://gohugo.io/getting-started/quick-start/ https://github.com/alex-shpak/hugo-book
